simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Sets the local memory manager housekeeping variables to default values. This routine gets called before each command is processed to verify that all the variables are properly cleared

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This function does not zero the command execution counter or the command error counter

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine gets called during each segment break in a load, dump, or memory fill operation and handles any processing that needs to be done during those breaks

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine will check if the actual length of a software bus command message matches the expected length and send an error event message if a mismatch occurs

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_MsgPtr_t pointer that references the software bus message
The expected length of the message based upon the command code

entry.para: Returns TRUE if the length is as expected
Returns FALSE if the length is not as expected

briefdescription.para: Verify memory peek and poke parameters.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This routine will run various checks on the specified address, memory type, and data size (in bits) for a memory peek or memory poke command

parameterdescription.para: The source or destination address for the requested peek or poke operation
The source or destination memory type for the requested peek or poke operation
The bit width for the requested peek or poke operation

entry.para: Returns TRUE if all the parameter checks passed
Returns FALSE any parameter check failed
